resources.string: How to Play Big Tic Tac Toe
Welcome to Big Tic Tac Toe! This is an advanced version of the classic game where each cell contains its own smaller Tic Tac Toe board.

1. Win small boards to claim them in the big board

2. Your move determines which small board your opponent must play in next

3. If sent to a completed board, you can play in any available board

4. Win three small boards in a row to win the game!
